base_descriptions.health: A potion that instantly restores {amount} of health.
base_descriptions.mana: A potion that instantly restores {amount} of mana.
base_descriptions.energy: A potion that instantly restores {amount} of energy.
base_descriptions.defense: A potion that increases defense by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
base_descriptions.damage: An potion that increases damage by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
base_descriptions.critical_rate: A potion that increases critical rate by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
base_descriptions.critical_damage: A potion that increases critical damage by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
base_descriptions.attack_speed: A potion that increases attack speed by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
base_descriptions.move_speed: A light potion that increases movement speed by {amount}% for {duration} seconds.
